column2:
"Ha ha, he's happy! Though I guess you can tell
that much just by looking at him. Seems there's
something up ahead he wants to show us."

"Inside? Protect... Machine? No, automata! Oh, I
think he's saying that's a sort of guardian of
this place."

"If that's the case, maybe it'll leave us alone if
we keep our distance. But I guess that's not
really an option, huh?"

"You've helped me so much,
<%me>.
I can't promise much, but I'll help as best as I can."

"This is gonna get dangerous, so you should
go hide for now. Don't come out until I give you
the all-clear, okay?"

"あはは……うれしそう
あれなら見てわかりますよね。
この先に見せたいものがあるようです。"

"奥？　守る？　機械？
なるほど、あれはさしずめ
守護者、ってことでしょうか。"

"なら、無理に奥に行かなければ
襲ってこないのかもしれませんけど……
そうもいきませんよね。"

"<%me>さんに
いっぱいお世話になりましたし
微力ながら私にも協力させてください。"

"危ないから、ちょっと隠れててね
いいって言うまで出てきちゃ駄目だよ。"
